name: Stranger Things
overview: A group of kids uncover supernatural mysteries in their small town.

name: The Last of Us
overview: Joel and Ellie navigate a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by infection.

name: House of the Dragon
overview: Set 200 years before the events of Game of Thrones, this series tells the story of House Targaryen.

name: The Mandalorian
overview: A lone bounty hunter travels through the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.
